name: Bouncing out of space
description:
A game where you use a force field to move elector balls to reach the end.

WASD to move
Space to jump
Mouse left click to Activate force filed

Developer - Abdulelah Alshalhoub
Game design - Abdullah Alzeer
Character art - Sara Hamed 
Background art  - Nahla Hafiz

Assets used:

Corgi Engine - 2D + 2.5D Platformer
Epic Toon FX

Music:

SeductressDubstep
Creative Commons Music by Jason Shaw on Audionautix.com
